mapper.sql: id, title, author, DOI, journal_name, ISSN, year, roll, journal, page, author_company, author_company_id, area, authors_address, abstracts, keywords, jcr_partition, impact_factor, subject, confirm_status, status
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_thesis_for_english
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_thesis_for_english (id, title, author, DOI, journal_name, ISSN, year, roll, journal, page, author_company, author_company_id, area, authors_address, abstracts, keywords, jcr_partition, impact_factor, subject, confirm_status, status ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{journalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roll,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{journal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorsAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abstracts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcrPartition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{impactFactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confirmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

journal_name = #{journalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_thesis_for_english set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOI = #{doi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, journal_name = #{journalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISSN = #{issn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roll = #{roll,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, journal = #{journal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page = #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_company = #{authorCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_company_id = #{authorCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authors_address = #{authorsAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abstracts = #{abstracts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jcr_partition = #{jcrPartition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, impact_factor = #{impactFactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, confirm_status = #{confirmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT city AS area,sum(thesis_for_english_num) AS count FROM t_area_and_company GROUP BY city;
SELECT DISTINCT author_company FROM t_thesis_for_english ;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_thesis_for_english_from_solr (abstract_id, journal_id, journal_title_main, pmid, issn, volume, issue, medline_date, medline_TA, article_title, medline_page, elocation_id_DOI, abstract_authors, language, publication_types, country, nlm_unique_ID, ISO_abbreviation, mesh_heads_UI, mesh_heads, qualifier, key_words, had_free_full_text, had_full_text, original_URL, authors_str, affiliation_str, journal_indexes, abstract_text, translateTest, tatistics_abstracts_blong_to_hospital_name) values
(#{item.abstractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.journalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.journalTitleMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.issn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.volume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.medlineDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.medlineTA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.medlinePage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.elocationIdDOI,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.abstractAuthors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.publicationTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nlmUniqueID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isoAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.meshHeadsUI,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.meshHeads,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qualifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hadFreeFullText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hadFullText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.originalURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.authorsStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.affiliationStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.journalIndexes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.abstractText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.translateTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tatisticsAbstractsBlongToHospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO t_thesis_for_english_from_solr (abstract_id, journal_id, journal_title_main, pmid, issn, volume, issue, medline_date, medline_TA, article_title, medline_page, elocation_id_DOI, abstract_authors, language, publication_types, country, nlm_unique_ID, ISO_abbreviation, mesh_heads_UI, mesh_heads, qualifier, key_words, had_free_full_text, had_full_text, original_URL, authors_str, affiliation_str, journal_indexes, abstract_text, translateTest, tatistics_abstracts_blong_to_hospital_name) values
(#{abstractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{journalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{journalTitleMain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medlineDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{medlineTA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medlinePage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elocationIdDOI,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abstractAuthors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicationTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nlmUniqueID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isoAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meshHeadsUI,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meshHeads,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hadFreeFullText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hadFullText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorsStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{affiliationStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{journalIndexes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abstractText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{translateTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tatisticsAbstractsBlongToHospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_thesis_for_english_from_solr
SELECT all_IFs FROM fd_journal WHERE journal_id = #{journalId}
SELECT DISTINCT jcr_partition FROM fd_partition_jcr WHERE journal_id = #{journalId}
SELECT DISTINCT classification_value FROM fd_classification WHERE journal_id = #{journalId}
SELECT city FROM t_area_and_company WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
SELECT subject AS area,count(*) AS count FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE `subject` IS NOT NULL AND `subject` != '未知' GROUP BY subject ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 0,20
mapper.insert: insert into t_count_top_subject (subject_code, top_num, count, type) values (#{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT id, subject, top_num,count, type FROM t_count_top_subject WHERE type = '外文' ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 0,20
mapper.insert: insert into t_count_top_keywords (id, keywords, count, top_num, type,area) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{topNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT id, keywords, top_num,count, type,area FROM t_count_top_keywords WHERE type = #{type} AND area = #{area}ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 0,20
SELECT sum(impact_factor) from t_thesis_for_english WHERE author_company_id LIKE #{companyId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_count_top_if (id, impact_factor_sum, company, subject, subject_avg_if, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{impactFactorSum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectAvgIf,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT id, impact_factor_sum, company, subject, subject_avg_if,type FROM t_count_top_if WHERE type = #{type}
SELECT author_company AS company, title AS subject,impact_factor AS impact_factor_sum FROM t_thesis_for_english ORDER BY impact_factor DESC LIMIT 0,20

SELECT `subject` AS subject,sum(impact_factor) as impact_factor_sum from t_thesis_for_english WHERE `subject` IS NOT NULL AND `subject` != '未知' GROUP BY `subject` ORDER BY impact_factor_sum DESC LIMIT 0,20;
SELECT avg(impact_factor) FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE `subject` LIKE #{subject}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE jcr_partition LIKE #{jcr,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id, jcr, area, company, count, type FROM t_count_top_jcr WHERE type = #{type}
SELECT count(*) FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE jcr_partition LIKE #{jcr} AND area like #{area}
SELECT id, jcr, area, company, count, type FROM t_count_top_jcr WHERE type = #{type} and jcr = #{jcr} order by count desc limit 0,10
SELECT journal_name AS area,count(*) as count FROM t_thesis_for_english GROUP BY journal_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 0,20
mapper.insert: insert into t_count_top_journal ( journal_name, count, type) values ( #{journalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT id, journal_name, count, type FROM t_count_top_journal WHERE type = #{type}
SELECT author FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE area LIKE #{area}
SELECT author FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE author LIKE #{author}
SELECT author_company FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE author_company_id LIKE #{companyId}
SELECT author_company FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE author_company LIKE #{company}
SELECT journal_id,title_main,all_IFs FROM fd_journal WHERE ISSN_E = #{issn} or ISSN_P = #{issn} or ISSN_L = #{issn} or ISSN_U = #{issn}
SELECT avg(impact_factor) FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE author_company_id LIKE #{companyId};
SELECT sum(impact_factor) FROM t_thesis_for_english WHERE author_company_id LIKE #{companyId};
